fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: During any day of the week that contains the letter “T”, you may submit your action to modkill one person.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
You may only perform your ability on Tuesday, Thursday, and Saturday.
It does not matter if you submit your action during the day phase or during the night phase.
Your target will be modkilled immediately if you submit your action during a day phase.
Your target will be modkilled at the end of the night if you submit your action during a night phase.
You have no limit to your killing ability, but may only kill one person per day of the week.
